group_1.textLeft: Woah woah woah, hold on.@Director AND lead heroine?!
So I'll be performing in my own work, right?@That isn't exactly...
I mean, I'm already on camera duty, for one thing.@Frankly, I believe Kira-senpai would be a much better@fit for...

group_1.textRight: I'd like to be a stagehand, actually.
And don't you think your small frame would make@for a more striking contrast, Mihono?

group_1.textLeft: ...Urk.
You've got a sharp eye, Kira-senpai. This height@difference WOULD be quite appealing...
Well, I've already given you the green light. I suppose@there's no sense in arguing over it!
...Oh, you agreed that quickly?@I thought I could get more of a rise out of you.

group_1.textRight: So you openly admit that you're trying to get a rise@out of me...?

group_1.textLeft: I guess Kira will be the one holding the camera@while Mihono's on screen, then?

group_1.textRight: If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were@ignoring me just now. But yes, that ought to work.

group_1.textLeft: You sure you're ready?

group_1.textRight: [chara:303901:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Yes! I shall fully immerse myself in the role of our@beautiful, dainty heroine!
Kira-senpai, I'll be counting on your ability to learn@proper camera handling.
Understood.

group_1.textLeft: Pleasure to be working with you, Director Mihono.

group_1.narration: And thus, despite the unexpected twist of@casting ourselves in the lead roles...
We scouted Magical Girls@who frequented the Coordinator's shop,@one by one...
And settled on our cast listing.
The colleagues of the female student from Mizuna...
The younger sisters of the young man from Kosho...
And the young man's childhood friend.

group_1.textLeft: ...This is surprising for several reasons.
I've actually had some correspondence with an@anonymous author on the internet...
But I never imagined that the author would actually@be a Magical Girl named Nemu Hiiragi...
...nor that she would introduce me to this, um...@"Uwasa" being.
Sorry to keep asking, but are you really alright with@this?

group_1.textRight: | Nemu told me about it, so I thought I'd give it@a try. |
| She said it'd be a worthwhile experience, at the@very least. |
| I've already stored all the information on my role@in my database. |
Nemu Hiiragi was that online pen-pal of yours, right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I suppose you could call it that... I just sent her@my impressions of her work, and got a reply back.
From there, we just sent each other the occasional@email every so often.

group_1.textRight: All the big girls from Mizuna really feel like fancy@young ladies!

group_1.textLeft: Ohohoho~!@What a perceptive little one you are!

group_1.textRight: I tried to get ahold of Tsukuyo too...
But it seems like she's really busy right now.

group_1.textCenter: Which is why I'm here as a backup for her...
I'm sorry in advance if anything strange happens.@It'll probably be my fault...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What is THAT supposed to mean?!

group_1.textRight: And over here, we have our leading couple.
My apologies. After several complications, we@decided to have the producers themselves play@the roles...

group_1.textLeft: Um, hi. I'm Mikura Komachi, playing the role of the@young man.

group_1.textCenter: Pleasure to be working with all of you.

group_1.textRight: Ooh!@You two look like a really nice couple.

group_1.textCenter: You see, I've researched my role to its fullest extent!

group_1.textRight: Um, incidentally...
Are you sure it's alright for us to just wear our@school uniforms?

group_1.textLeft: We had been wondering about that as well, so we@looked into it...

group_1.textRight: ...What should we do for the other actors' costumes?

group_1.textLeft: Almost all of them are students, right?@I think their own uniforms should be fine.

group_1.textRight: Is that your opinion as our designated historical@researcher?

group_1.textLeft: Yep! I've even got sources to back it up.
Namely, these photos of students at the women's@school that served as the predecessor to Mizuna@Girls' School.

group_1.textRight: May we see them?
Huh... these are more modern than you'd expect?@No hakama or anything like that.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this was right around the time when women's@schools began switching over to Western-style@uniforms.
Schools in Kamihama seemed to be particularly@early adopters, too.

group_1.textRight: They look quite similar to today's uniforms.

group_1.textLeft: They really do!

group_1.textRight: Even if we tailor our costumes to match these, I don't@think anybody would be particularly wowed by it.
It IS a very subtle difference, after all.

group_1.textLeft: ...I know, right?
We've already modernized the lead couple's outfits@a little bit, too.
So I feel like using today's uniforms as-is would be@just about perfect, no?

group_1.textRight: ...Ah, that makes sense!
In that case, you can count on me to liven up the@scene!
Miss Lead Actress!
Do take care not to be obscured by my exquisite@aura!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303902:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Indeed! There's no way I'll lose.

group_1.textRight: Oh. How... aggressive?
